subject: Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
Horses
lead_paragraph: Trainer Steve Asmussen shook off Pyro’s poor performance in Saturday’s Blue Grass Stakes, saying that his colt had an aversion to Keeneland’s synthetic surface.
snippet: Trainer Steve Asmussen shook off Pyro’s poor performance in Saturday’s Blue Grass Stakes, saying that his colt had an aversion to Keeneland’s synthetic surface.
